resources.string:
Simple AI is a fully local, on device AI based on Gemma 3n. By running completely on device, Simple AI usage has zero environmental impact and maximum privacy.
Web search through DuckDuckGo is in beta. Aside from search queries, nothing leaves your phone.
This will download the full Gemma 3n E4B model to your device. This will take approximately 8GB of your %1$sGB remaining storage.

By proceeding, you agree to the following terms: Gemma is provided under and subject to the Gemma Terms of Use found at ai.google.dev/gemma/terms. You must not use any of the Gemma Services for the restricted uses set forth in the Gemma Prohibited Use Policy at ai.google.dev/gemma/prohibited_use_policy, or in violation of applicable laws and regulations.
Not enough memory. Have %1$s GB, need %2$s GB.
Not enough storage. Have %1$s GB, need %2$s GB.
Not enough memory and storage. Have %1$sGB memory (need %2$s GB) and %3$s GB storage (need %4$s GB).
Chats with media (images/audio) cannot be saved to history and will be lost once you leave this screen.
